description: This file defines the NoteSearch utility class, which provides static methods for filtering notes based on a search query within their title or content. It facilitates case-insensitive, trimmed query matching and returning filtered note lists.

classes.name: NoteSearch
classes.description: Utility class providing static methods for searching and filtering Note objects based on a search query.

methods.name: filter
methods.description: Filters a list of Note objects, returning notes where the title or content contains the trimmed, lowercase query string. Returns all notes if the query is empty.
